item.title: Android app?
item.description: Nordaaker just got an Android device. <a href="http://arne.nordaaker.com/">Arne</a> is currently fondling a Google Nexus One. Sleek piece of hardware. I've been thinking we should do an Android app. Question number one is which language? 21:11 <@sri> java? 21:11 <@marcus> hmm? 21:11 <@marcus> No, I don't think so 21:11 <@marcus> Scala maybe 21:11 <@sri> mhm, scala seems bearable 21:11 <@marcus> my thoughts precicely
